author: Mark Abeles-Allison
text:
I am looking for examples of regional criminal justice programs that share expertise and knowledge across multiple counties.  I am interested in services offered by one county that can be purchased by another.  How did you do this, through contract or intergovernmental agreement?
Thanks.
title: Regional Criminal Justice
